task_description:
# Score Explanation Cards

Add detailed explanation cards for each scoring factor that explain WHY it matters for the algorithm. Include tips, examples, and research backing.

## Rationale
Addresses the market gap where tools don't teach users WHY content performs. Creator Buddy's algorithm analyzer is criticized as generic - Punchline X can be specific and educational.

## User Stories
- As a creator, I want to understand WHY my hook score is low so that I can learn to write better hooks
- As a learner, I want algorithm insights so that I improve over time instead of just following suggestions

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Each of 7 scoring factors has an explanation card
- [ ] Cards explain the algorithm principle behind the factor
- [ ] Cards include good and bad examples
- [ ] Cards link to relevant research or data
